TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMultiTargetingSupportService

Docs.summary: Provides multi-targeting for Windows Workflow Designer hosts.

remarks.format:
## Remarks *Multi-targeting* is the ability to find the right version of the loaded assembly that corresponds to the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version of the current workflow project in [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)].
This interface is implemented and used internally by [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] designer components to resolve [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies in a multi-targeting aware fashion within the [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)] hosting application. The [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] designer components use the implementation of this interface only when additional assemblies need to be loaded dynamically into the editing `AppDomain`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Reflection.Assembly GetReflectionAssembly(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName targetAssemblyName) cil managed
Public Function GetReflectionAssembly (targetAssemblyName As AssemblyName) As Assembly

Docs.summary: Returns the currently loaded assembly given the assembly name.
Docs.returns: The currently loaded assembly given the assembly name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type GetRuntimeType(class System.Type reflectionType) cil managed
Public Function GetRuntimeType (reflectionType As Type) As Type

Docs.param: The type to get the runtime type of.
Docs.summary: Gets the runtime type that corresponds to the specified type.
Docs.returns: The runtime type that corresponds to the specified type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsSupportedType(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified type is supported.
Docs.returns: if the specified type is supported; otherwise, .
